Question.Subject: What should I name my blog?
Question.Content: I'm planning to post my opinion on different video games i've played, as well as write about recent events that happened to me. What should i name my blog? Can i change the name of my blog if i wanted to? Thanks in advance!
Question.ChosenAnswer:
If you created your blog on one of the big ones like blogspot or wordpress then you can't change the name because the subdomain is your name. Why not just make 2 different blogs 1 for games and 1 for you since they are free.
But to name it, how about "video game opinions you actually want to read"? heheh

Answer.Content:
